item.title: ::Alert command needed!
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

correct me if im wrong but you need the yell void too…

just use this its better nd simpler

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights >= 0) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Heres the void figure out where to put it

public void yell(String message) { for (Player p : handler.players) { if ((message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0) || (message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0)) return; if ((p == null) || !p.isActive) continue; client temp = (client) p; if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0)) if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive) temp.sM(message); } }

{
try {

		PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="[~!ANNOUNCEMENT!~]://or watever you want it to say(erase this after) "+command.substring(8);
		sendMessage("You have successfully sent an announcement.");
